eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Mississippi; AT 01:45 PM ON OCT 06, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:45 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST initiated by the Mississippi Department of Public Safety. This is only a test. No action is required.
